s3games.robot

Class RobotSerialPort

  • java.lang.Object
    • s3games.robot.RobotSerialPort

  • public class RobotSerialPort
extends java.lang.Object
    RobotSerialPort class is responsible for communicating with the SSC-32 robot controller over the serial line. It utilizes the RXTX library

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RobotSerialPort(java.lang.String portName)
      construct a robot serial port object with the specified port name

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      close the communication link with the SSC-32 controller
      void open()
      open the communication link with the SSC-32 controller

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
